Articles.Content:
Bring customizable parts back and make way more parts procedural. Stacking of parts is very time consuming and is often not he exact size I want. Also with the current amount of parts and the ones that will be added searching for a part would be nice.

Some examples: 
fuel tanks: 
•    regular: procedural in length (smooth) and width (stepwise xs,s,m,l,xl)
          o    maybe for tanks add sizes: sm, ml and xxl
•    MK2/MK3: procedural in length
•    MK2/MK3 to regular adapter: en length procedural and regular side in width 
•    Droptank: procedural in length (smooth) and width (stepwise xs,s,m,l,xl)
•    Donut tank: just size switchable (xs,s,m,l,xl)
•    Make (for liquid feul) chosable which feul will go in tank
          o    Options (Methalox, Hydrolox and keralox)
          o    Slider for feul/oxidizer ratio: practically for engines that work with or without oxidizer
          o    No need anymore for methane only thanks 
          o    Tank automatically switches to type of detached engine (also be dome manually if necceserry)
 

Engines:
•    Customizable engine nozzles
          o    Choose from thick atmosphere (eve) (small)
          o     sea-level kerbin (medium)
          o    thin admoshere (high kerbin or duna) (standard)
          o    vacuum (biggest)
•    choose variants for feul type
          o    Choose liquid fuel engine variant for hydrolox, methalox and keralox
                        Default is methalox
          o    For nuclear this option also is available (hydrogen, methane and kerosine)
                        Default is hydrogen  by far most efficient
          o    Jets also switchable
                        Default kerosine
          o    Tank automatically switches to same as engine
                        Can be separately done if necessary

Solid rocked boosters
•    In lengt procedural in sizes S, M and L
          o    Only 3 needed
•    Add cones with SRB separator build in for every size 
          o    maybe length procedural and asymmetric option
•    In tech tree progression for this parts will be more powerful longer and other options like Gimbel

Cargo parts
•    Cargo bays procedural in lengt
•    MK2/MK3 crew parts stepwise (per window) procedural in lengt  (more size options)
•    Open cargo part also in lengt procedural

Solar pannels 
•    Easy placements for making big solar farms
          o    Procedural is not necessary (real life also standard size)
•    In tech tree they will get more efficient while progressing
Parts like struts, panels and radiators will already become procedural

I think making parts like this would give players way more customizability, part options without just adding way to much parts and having to search endlessly
